analysis: Rating 4/10 - Bearish/Cautious. Hero image: Trump with stern/serious expression alongside headline about US trade deficit surging. All three major indices in red (S&P -0.14%, Dow -0.21%, Nasdaq -0.09%). Key headlines include trade deficit at historic levels, potential Iran strikes, Walmart cautious outlook, Carvana falling. Only a few positive data points (Deere, jobless claims). Overall cautious/bearish sentiment conveyed.
